thegame

Interface Screen


  • public interface Screen
    Interface for game screens. All screen implementations must provide these methods to handle rendering and input.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float ASPECT_RATIO 
      static float BASE_HEIGHT 
      static float BASE_WIDTH 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleCharInput(int codepoint)
      Handles character input events.
      void handleKeyPress(int key, int action)
      Handles key press events.
      void handleMouseClick(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles mouse click events.
      void handleMouseMove(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles mouse movement events.
      void handleMouseRelease(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles mouse release events.
      void render()
      Renders the screen.
      default float toGLX(float screenX) 
      default float toGLY(float screenY)

      • toGLX

        default float toGLX(float screenX)

      • toGLY

        default float toGLY(float screenY)

      • render

        void render()
        Renders the screen. Called once per frame.

      • handleMouseClick

        void handleMouseClick(double mouseX,
                      double mouseY)
        Handles mouse click events.
        Parameters:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse

      • handleMouseMove

        void handleMouseMove(double mouseX,
                     double mouseY)
        Handles mouse movement events.
        Parameters:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse

      • handleMouseRelease

        void handleMouseRelease(double mouseX,
                        double mouseY)
        Handles mouse release events.
        Parameters:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse

      • handleKeyPress

        void handleKeyPress(int key,
                    int action)
        Handles key press events.
        Parameters:
        key - The key code
        action - The action (GLFW_PRESS, GLFW_RELEASE, GLFW_REPEAT)

      • handleCharInput

        void handleCharInput(int codepoint)
        Handles character input events.
        Parameters:
        codepoint - The Unicode code point of the character
